concept.title: Drawing Tools in Figma
concept.shortdesc: Drawing tools in Figma help create curated path networks that customize your design.
concept.conbody:
Figma's drawing tools account for three different kinds of brush strokes to make your designs take on a hand-drawn feel in digital spaces. The drawing tools contain vectorized brushes, advanced stroke settings, fills, and more!
Brushes
Brushed add hand-drawn elements to your designs for your projects. You can draw directly inside your Figma Design file using the pencil andbrush tools. These tools create vecotr networks by placing vector points along your drawing path. The vector points of your drawing can be edited using vector edit mode.
These brush styles can be further customized by creating single vecotr layers using shapes, flattened text layers, and custom vector paths.
Textures
You can add layers to the drawings to enhance the final product with different effects.
The seven types of effects in Figma Draw are:
Glass
Drop shadow
Layer blur
inner shadow
Background blur
Noise
Texture
Experiment with these different textures and effects in your design to add more depth do your drawings!
